summary: I OWN A HONDA CIVIC EX 2001, AND THE HANDLING ON THE CAR IS UNSAFE DUE TO FAULTY STRUTS. THE CAR RATTLES AND SHAKES ON EVEN THE SLIGHTEST OF BUMPS. I BOUGHT THE CAR NEW AND HAD THE RIGHT FRONT STRUT REPLACED AT 23,000 MILES. AT 27,000 I HAD TO REPLACE THE LEFT RIGHT STRUT AS WELL. THE PARTS ARE ON BACK ORDER DUE TO WHAT HONDA REP DESCRIBED IS A VERY COMMON PROBLEM ON 2001 HONDA CIVICS. *JB
